name: places/ChIJm-I7AZhYwokR5y6yBNKj8EQ
formattedAddress: 55 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 55 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: I am really happy I was referred to Dr. Quirno. The past couple of years I have been  suffering for lower back pain due to a slight slip disc from playing soccer. I explained the difficulties I was having and how unmanageable the pain was after I have exhausted all other treatment avenues. Dr. Quirno explained to me all the options available and I went with surgery. He was amazing throughout the whole process. From pre op appointments to assisting with difficulties I had obtaining my pain meds post op, to my final visit, Dr. Quirno was amazing. I could not have placed my health/life/trust in anyone else. Thank you Dr. Quirno  and your wonderful team for everything! You gave me back the ability to hike, run and walk without pain or discomfort. Dr. Quirno is one of the best, if not the best orthopedic surgeon there is! I recommend him to any and everyone in need of relief!

originalText.text:
Dr. Quirno is top notch. I was of course nervous as the last time I was told I needed back surgery was at least a decade and a half ago. I opted not to. My problem got worst and was brought to the ER where I was told to go to a Spine Surgeon. That’s when I found Dr. Quirno. He is skilled, engaging and has a wonderful bedside manner. He came to see me before the surgery and called afterwards.
I highly recommend Dr. Quirno, if you need Spine Surgery

originalText.text: I had very positive outcome to my surgery. What makes Dr. Quirno a great doctor is that he explained my condition, what the surgery entailed and what recovery would be like in digestible terms. He guided me through the various stages of recovery and healing, answering all of my questions with patience.

originalText.text: I was referred to Dr. Quirno due to herniated disc in my neck and i exhausted all options for pain management, Dr. Quirno was very comforting, compassionate and informative , we discussed different options and outcomes and i opted to have surgery. to say he is the best surgeon in nyc would be an understatement he was very involved with my care pre and post op and im almost a year out from surgery and the discomfort and pain i was experiencing for so long is gone. Thank you Dr. Quirno. If i could give more than 5 stars i would.

Thank you Dr. Quirno. If i could give more than 5 stars i would.

originalText.text: Dr Quirno and his wonderful surgical coordinator, Jeanette have been nothing but kind, empathetic, and compassionate. Everything was explained in great detail and all non surgical options were explored. Once all non surgical options were exhausted our daughter underwent a spinal surgery and from start to finish Dr Q and Jeanette explained everything in great detail from pre op, to intra op to post op care. The expertise with this injury and how to treat it was clearly defined from the first visit! Dr Q worked alongside two other surgeons who again showed nothing but kindness, compassion, and patience with two nervous parents! From start to finish I give Dr Q and his team 5 stars and will be forever grateful to him for all that he has done for our daughter.
